node.title: The Most Essential and Attacked Gift of God's Remnant Church, Part 1
node.description: How can we be sure Ellen G. White is a prophet? Why are her writings important and even necessary? We will also look at some common attacks, clarify some misunderstandings of her ministry and see how the attack of her writings in the time of the end was foretold. Come and discover what you need to know about Ellen G. White.
